short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sousou no Frieren Wallpaper turn new tab to Frieren: Beyond Journey's End background. Frieren wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Each new tab displays a shuffled Frieren wallpaper.
2. Customize your Frieren background from the wallpaper selection panel or set it as a favorite.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing website shortcuts easily.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Download wallpapers directly from the new tab.
14. Instant access to games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your Frieren new tab page.
